Reference

All functions

backup_indicators()

Backup indicators in batch mode

build_report()

Build report from template

build_sort_portfolios()

Build sort portfoilos basing on group list of stocks

clean_extremes_mad()

Clean extremes by MAD method

clean_extremes_sigma()

Clean extremes by normal sigma method

clear_tables()

Clear data in all tables in stock database

close_stock_db()

Close the stock database

Translate code into name

Class creator of code_name_list class

composite_factor()

Build composite factor by aggregating related factors

compute_indicator()

Compute indicator by customized function and variables timeseries

Convert a raw importing file through process_fun

create_attribute_def_fun()

Create definition function of new attribute for modifying indicator

create_indicator()

Create indicator by definition function and variables timeseries

create_indicator_def_fun()

Create definition function of indicator for computing indicator

delete_indicators()

Delete indicators in batch mode

Compute z-scores of factors dataset

Fetch many datasets from stock_db

Generate indicators in batch mode

Get assets return from market and stocks return

Get data source info for importing raw data
